name: BallerHouse
overview:
Ballerhouse, Inc. produces the Ballerhouse Network of content-based and community-oriented lifestyle websites. The Ballerhouse Network comprises the following sites with more to follow soon:

BallerHouse BallerHouse.com features information on the hottest custom home products, collections, and international real estate on the market. At BallerHouse.com youâ€™ll find ideas, expert advice and resources to help you trick out your house or apt. As youâ€™ll discover in all of our network sites, BallerHouse.com interviews celebrities, entrepreneurs, and other high rollers so that you can see how some of the worldâ€™s biggest ballers are spending their cash.

BallerRide BallerRide.com keeps you up to date on the latest high-end whips, bikes, planes, helicopters, boats, yachts, and other toys. BallerRide also covers rides-related products and the Worldâ€™s best customizing shops.

BallerHub BallerHub.com is your place to show the world how youâ€™re living and check out who else is living the baller lifestyle. At BallerHub you can create a custom profile with descriptions and pictures of your crib, collections, and rides. Even if you havenâ€™t made it big time yet, you can post a wish list of the stuff you plan to own once youâ€™ve got the cash. Also at BallerHub, you can rate othersâ€™ pictures and compete with your pictures in the Battle section.

More about the companyâ€¦ Ballerhouse was founded in 2007 by A.J. Yeakel and Mark L. The company is headquartered in San Francisco, California and incorporated in the State of Delaware.
